Package suncertify.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientConfigDialog
    ClientConfigDialog extends ConfigDialog and provides more specific configuration options for when running in client mode.
    ConfigDialog
    ConfigDialog is the root interface of all the configuration dialog interfaces i.e.
    ServerConfigDialog
    ServerConfigDialog extends ConfigDialog and provides more specific configuration options for when running in server mode.
    StandaloneConfigDialog
    StandaloneConfigDialog requires the user to provide the path to the database file
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationWindow
    The ApplicationWindow class represents the main graphical user interface that the CSR uses to interact with the application.
    ClientConfigDialogGUI
    ClientConfigDialogGUI implements ClientConfigDialog interface and is responsible for displaying and getting the relevant configuration options for the client operating mode.
    ConfigurationPropertiesManager
    ConfigurationPropertiesManager manages the configuration data for the application.
    ServerConfigDialogGUI
    ServerConfigDialogGUI implements ServerConfigDialog interface and is responsible for displaying and getting the relevant configuration options for the server operating mode.
    ServerWindow
    The ServerWindow class represents a small window used to display to the user that the server has been started.
    StandaloneConfigDialogGUI
    StandaloneConfigDialogGUI implements StandaloneConfigDialog interface and is responsible for getting the location of the database file from the user when running the application in standalone mode
    SubcontractorTableModel
    The SubcontractorTableModel class acts as a proxy model to the actual database by storing a list of subcontractor records which is then displayed in the table view of the application's window.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StartException
    The class StartException should be used when the application is unable to start for whatever reason.
